website_summaries.verdict: This sharp-looking gaming laptop packs in graphics power, but spending a bit more might be a wiser long-term investment.
pros: An inexpensive way to get a very decent graphics card for PC gaming
The reworked design is fun and has a premium look and feel
cons: Investing in the GPU requires some cut corners, including a washed-out display and annoying touch pad

customer_reviews.title: Love the design first of all
customer_reviews.text: Love the design first of all. Quality built Seems to be very fast but planning on upgrading the HHD to SSD pretty soon which should boost the speed a lot. also plan on adding another 8 gb ram. The Screen "WOW' everyone sees it and comments on the crispness of the screen. The video card is ok since we only watch movies and do no editing. but still very fast. We will enjoy for years to come
customer_reviews.author: D. Rucker

customer_reviews.title: LAPTOP HAD MISSING PARTS. DO NOT BUY FROM THIS SELLER.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the laptop a while back only to find that after opening up to upgrade RAM the laptop was missing SSD and for some reason the barcode was scratched out with a pen. The seller should be a hard pass. Not worth the risk if you really want a dell buy directly from Dell even if its through an amazon order some of these third party sellers are a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Very nice up-to-date laptop for most uses.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a friend. It is well designed and the touch screen is a real plus, especially at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this computer, it looks beautiful and responds fast!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: The touch is good and display marvelous
customer_reviews.text: Battlefield 1 works on ultra settings smoothly. The touch is good and display marvelous!
customer_reviews.author: M Haseeb Javed

customer_reviews.title: Amazing laptop!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this computer. Only been using it for a few days now but it's pretty incredible! The graphics arr absolutely stunning! Bought this for doing my photography and it runs everything with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop for the money, I love the backlit keyboard makes gaming easy in the dark. The 4K screen is beautiful, but obviously you can't game on 4K with the internal gpu. But if you are looking for a good quality laptop with moderate to high gaming performance, then this is the laptop for you. (I recommend installing another 8gb so-dim stick of RAM for the best gaming performance roughy $50 about the time of this review. (Also you should probably install it yourself, there are many videos on YouTube showing how to on this specific laptop. (It is easy)))
customer_reviews.author: Becky Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good computer, hard drive not so fast, rest is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Andrés T.

customer_reviews.title: Be a Cautious Consumer
customer_reviews.text: This was my fourth Dell after three other attempts to purchase a PC. The three before this one has various issues ranging from charging defects to hdd defects. This one works great and is easily upgradeable. My advice is to be careful in your purchase and be aware of your warranty and return guidelines.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Sent with a hard drive that only lasted 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Computer came with Problems
customer_reviews.text: Computer came with problems, not working properly, saying that "A required device isnt connected or cant be accessed"
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable after short time
customer_reviews.text: Hard drive fail at 24 months. Loose bolt on display hinge. Power cable insulation crack. Unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio001

product_meta.title: Dell Inspiron 7000 15.6" UHD 4k Touchscreen Laptop, Intel Quad Core i7-6700HQ, 8GB RAM, 1TB HDD+8GB SSHD, NVIDIA 960M 4GB Graphics, Backlit Keyboard, Bluetooth, HDMI, 802.11AC, Win 10
